description: Kindle Create can be used to publish various types of books, such as novels, essays, textbooks, travel guides, cookbooks, and poem collections. To create a KPF file in Kindle Create, open the .KCB project file that stores your book, then click Publish or select File â†’ Publish .
Depending on the type of book being published, the KPF file may also save video, images, and links to webpages. You can then upload the KPF file to Kindle Direct Publishing to be published.
